Introducing: Simurai

The next speaker in our line up is Simon, or Simurai (@simurai) as he is better known.

Born in the Swiss Alps this self confessed “CSS doodler” is the master mind behind some of the most impressive demos I‘ve seen, including the infamous Cursor Monster.

His love of technology and the arts, mixed with creative coding, has given rise to some awesome demos and ideas. Below are some of my favourites:

We love his creativity so much we jumped at the chance to fly him down from Japan.

If you want to catch Simurai you should purchase a ticket whilst they’re still available.

CSSConf Australia is a one-day conference to bring together the designers and developers creating the future face of the web
